Package com.mygdx.game.controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BotBehaviour
    bot behaviour interface (Strategy design Pattern)
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardController
    Class containing the player's board in charge of every operation on it
    CarrierController
    CarrierController class created because of the differences needed in the methods related to the Carrier ship relating to the other ships
    CellController
    Cell Controller class in charge of all the logic around the cell
    CrazyBehaviour
    bot behaviours implementing the BotBehaviour interface (Strategy design Pattern)
    EasyBehaviour
    bot behaviours implementing the BotBehaviour interface (Strategy design Pattern)
    GameController
    Class in charge of the game, contains the user board and the bot board
    HardBehaviour
    bot behaviours implementing the BotBehaviour interface (Strategy design Pattern)
    ShipController
    ShipController class in charge of every operation on the ship model
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BoardController.Ships
    Enum with the ship types
    GameController.State
    State of the game in the end, if the user won or lost
